figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Flow chart of inclusion and exclusion.

figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: Growth of publications on breast cancer endocrine therapy (2003–2022).

figure_3.title: Figure 3.
figure_3.caption: Geographical distribution of retrieved articles in breast cancer endocrine therapy (2003–2022).

figure_4.title: Figure 4.
figure_4.caption: The growth trends of the top 10 nations/regions in breast cancer endocrine therapy (2003–2022).

figure_5.title: Figure 5.
figure_5.caption: The network map of country/region’ cooperation.

figure_6.title: Figure 6.
figure_6.caption: Cluster density visualization map of institutions on breast cancer endocrine therapy (2003–2022).

figure_7.title: Figure 7.
figure_7.caption: Density visualization map of journals on breast cancer endocrine therapy (2003–2022).

figure_8.title: Figure 8.
figure_8.caption: The top 25 burst words from 2003 to 2022.

figure_9.title: Figure 9.
figure_9.caption: Mountain visualization of major MeSH terms/MeSH subheading terms of articles on breast cancer endocrine therapy.

claims.sentence:
Investigation of publications output
A total of 1,046 research articles and 271 review articles, all in accordance with the inclusion criteria, were identified in the realm of breast cancer endocrine therapy (see 
Figure 1
).

The publication growth trajectories for major countries are displayed in 
Figure 4.

Open in a new tab
The growth trends of the top 10 nations/regions in breast cancer endocrine therapy (2003–2022).Figure 5.

Open in a new tab
The network map of country/region’ cooperation.Figure 6.

Figure 7
 provides an overview of the journals that have particularly excelled in this study domain.
